activities:
The personal data we process for our clients is basic mailing information, such as name, address, city, state/country, and zip code.
We receive data files from our clients via secure SFTP transfer.  Data that passes through Wilen Direct is not enhanced, individually viewed, collected, or put to use for any other purpose than the fulfillment of each client’s exact specifications.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client data.  Some data is manually processed
recoursemech: European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) of Switzerland.
